page.title: 04ETHNIC MIX
page.content:
In our school there are 202 children. 55 of them speak a language other than English at home.
The families of these children came from various parts of the world. Most were from Asia. Altogether, nine Asian, six European and five African languages are spoken at Grange Middle School.
Apart from English the most common languages spoken are: Urdu (8), Polish (6), Punjabi (6), French (5), Nepali (4) and Arabic (4).
In our area there is a Greek School, a Polish School and an Armenian School. Children go to them after day school or at weekends.
